About Vesatogo

- We are a global product enabling startup into the 6th year of its operations. We help other global startups and entrepreneurs to build innovative consumer-facing products and applications over both web and mobile.

- We are a Nasscom 10k Nurtured startup with our in-house product Fitko, which is a consumer-facing platform and a fitness tech. solution. Some of our notable achievements include being awarded the Hot 100 startups award in 2014. Skills we are looking for : - Experience in developing front-end applications at scale - Strong knowledge and experience in HTML(5), CSS, SCSS and Advanced JavaScript - Experience of writing modular/reusable code and using JS frameworks like React.js - Experience with data structure libraries (e.g., Immutable.js) - Familiarity with RESTful APIs - Strong knowledge of Web Storage (Cookie, Local Storage and Session Storage) - Knowledge of modern authorization mechanisms, such as JWT - Familiarity with modern front-end build pipelines and tools - Hands-on experience of building web apps using React. - Deep understanding of Javascript programming language and ES6. - Ability to work in a lean-agile development environment. Good to know : - Proficiency in TypeScript and/or Flow - Knowledge of AWS - Familiarity with GraphQL will be a brownie point

) } } export default JobDetailView
